name: Rem and Ram RE:ZERO Cosplay ꕤ*.ﾟ (LoRA)
description:
Hiii ໒꒰ྀི´ ˘ ` ꒱ྀིづ I'm in the process of trying to make my descriptions for Lora's shorter and more concise so please let me know if you guys like the change !! <3

My intended purpose of this Lora is to let any character or person you want cosplay as Rem OR Ram from Re:Zero !! <3 I used ChillOutMix to train and produce some of the images !! ^^

I recommend keeping the weight between (0.8-1) and using the negative prompts as needed !! Only lower if your using other loras aswell !!!

  1. use trigger words Rem_ReZero, blue eyes to get Rem.

  2. use trigger words Ram_ReZero_2, red eyes to get Ram.

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

Please be kind with this Lora ♡ Also thank you all so much for the continued support on my Lora's !! I genuinely love when i see the same people comment on multiple different things I post it warms my heart !! ⸜(｡˃ ᵕ ˂ )⸝♡

modelVersions.name: Rem_and_Ram_REZERO_V1
modelVersions.description:
I recommend keeping the weight between (0.8-1) and using the negative prompts as needed !! Only lower if your using other loras aswell !!!

I also highly recommend using the inpaint face trick to fix the faces !!

Here are all the settings used for most the examples:

Size: 512x1024

Model: chilloutmix_NiPrunedFp32Fix

Clip skip: 2

If you have any issues please tell me and ill try and help !! ૮₍ ˶ᵔ ᵕ ᵔ˶ ₎ა

meta.prompt:
best quality,(8k, RAW photo, best quality, masterpiece:1.39), (realistic, photo-realistic:1.2), 1girl, Ram_ReZero_2, red eyes,ulzzang-6500-v1.1, cleavage
 <lora:Rem_and_Ram_REZERO-20:0.9>
